node.title: A 2020 Rewind & Grid 2.4 News!
node.excerpt: Grid 2.4 is now live on testnet and we've got some 2020 highlights to share with you as well!

node.title: August 18 AMA Recap
node.excerpt: Sharing the recording of yesterday's AMA where we discussed farming, the token, TF Grid use cases, and TF Grid 3.0.

node.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partner with ThreeFold
node.excerpt: Dash, Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.

node.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFolds decentralized Grid
node.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned  both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

node.title: Digital Twin v1 is Coming!
node.excerpt: The first version of Digital Twin will feature messaging and video calling.

node.title: What's Possible on Grid 2
node.excerpt: While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0, we wanted to outline what's already available to test on Grid 2.

node.title: We're Tackling Internet Inequalities
node.excerpt: Let's break down Internet inequalities, together. Find out how ThreeFold is already collaborating to make this a reality!

node.title: The November 2020 community call recording
node.excerpt: For those who missed yesterday's community call (~30 minutes) or would like to rewatch, you can find the recording within!

node.title: Announcing the November 2020 community call
node.excerpt: Mark your calendars! Next Monday November 2nd at 5pm CET we will host a 30-minute community call to update you on exciting progress and to show you what well be working towards in the coming months.

node.title: November 10 product management highlights
node.excerpt: Some quick product management highlights for you, within, & a major thank you to everyone working so hard on these products and solutions every day!

node.title: ThreeFold's October 2020 community update is here
node.excerpt: Its the end of October and a lot has gone on this month  an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more! Find the link to the full update within!

node.title: ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community
node.excerpt: SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.

node.title: A First Look at Terraform on TF Grid 3.0
node.excerpt: A demo on how easy it is to create, use, and destroy deployments on TF Grid 3.0 using Terraform.

node.title: ThreeFold participating @ Global Reset!

node.title: TFT is more accessible; now available via PancakeSwap and a BTC Integration on ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: Today, the bridge to BSC is live, making TFT available on PancakeSwap! And anyone can now buy TFT with BTC directly on the ThreeFold Connect app.

node.title: ThreeFold Tech recognized by Deloitte Belgium
node.excerpt: Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech, which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition! More within.

node.title: ThreeFold partners with Hewlett Packard Enterprise
node.excerpt: Dubai, UAE, Today at GITEX Technology Week, ThreeFold signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)

node.title: ThreeFold and Presearch partner to decentralize search nodes and storage
node.excerpt: Privacy and decentralization are some of the values shared by both Presearch and ThreeFold, at the core of their missions to create scalable technologies..

node.title: TomoChain & ThreeFold are joining forces to decentralize Cloud Computing
node.excerpt: TomoChain will invite their developer community and anyone interested in contributing to the TomoChain Blockchain, to connect and use the Threefold Grid.

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.
